I headed into the main hall to look for Shion.%K%P
Her beloved laptop was there, but Shion herself was\nnowhere to be found.%K%P
\dIf you're looking for Shion, she headed out to the\nrear shrine.\d%K%P
\dAlone? That's a scary thought.\d%K%P
\dShe is a Goddess you know. She'll be fine.\d%K%P
\dI'm gonna go find her. She may be a Goddess, but\nshe's still just a girl out there alone.\d%K%P
\dWhy did she have to head out at a time like this?\d%K%P
I complained aloud to myself as I walked the trail.%K%P
Shion's passion for success was stronger than the\nothers', but there was a blind spot in her\nknowledge.%K%P
She was good at watching others, but not good at\nwatching out for herself.%K%P
When would she realize what she had?%K%P
It made no difference how long it took me to get\nthere.%K%P
Yet I found myself running just the same.%K%P
Found her!%K%P
\dShi-on!\d%K%P
\dHmm? Aki? What's the matter?\d%K%P
She seemed puzzled to find me there.%K%P
\dWhat's the matter? Well...\d%K%P
\dDid you need me for something?\d%K%P
\dUh, no, but...\d%K%P
I'd let myself get worried.%K%P
But she was just the same as always, which was a\nrelief.%K%P
\dWere you worried about me?\d%K%P
\dW-Well, yeah. That a problem?\d%K%P
\dWait, you really came running out here 'cuz you\nwere worried? I was just kidding. I didn't really\nthink...\d%K%P
\dCome on. A girl out alone at night. I was\nworried.\d%K%P
\dIt's not like there's anyone out around here.\d%K%P
\dNot people, but what about bears or something...?\d%K%P
\dNgh...\d%K%P
Even Shion must've be afraid of bears.%K%P
\dW-Well, come on. You can at least help me finish\nup here.\d%K%P
We were almost to the shrine.%K%P
We walked side-by-side into the Chinju Forest.%K%P
\dIt is kinda spooky at night, huh?\d%K%P
The darkness only grew more dense in the forest.%K%P
The place might be under Kaede's protection, but it\nwas still off-putting.%K%P
Shion clung to me as we headed toward the shrine.%K%P
\dOh, let there be light!\d%K%P
She was overjoyed by the sight of the fluorescent\nlamps.%K%P
\dIt certainly helps the nerves, huh.\d%K%P
\dDefinitely. I was starting to think I should have\nwaited 'til tomorrow for a second there.\d%K%P
\dWe could have turned around, you know.\d%K%P
\dThat'd be such a pain.\d%K%P
Now that was just like her.%K%P
\dI'm glad you showed up though. Thanks for that.\d%K%P
She started to dig through her things.%K%P
\dWhat are you looking for?\d%K%P
\dWhat? I can't tell you that.\d%K%P
\dI'll help if you do.\d%K%P
\dOkay fine, I'm looking for a game.\d%K%P
She told me the name of it, and I started to help\nher look for it.%K%P
\dYou came all this way for a game...?\d%K%P
\dHey, I just wanted to play all of a sudden, okay?\d%K%P
\dYou know how it is, right? Right?\d%K%P
\dYeah, I guess so.\d%K%P
I broke out some retro games when the urge hit me\nfrom time to time.%K%P
Still, I would never come out this far at night.%K%P
\dAh-ha! Found it!\d%K%P
\dThat didn't take long, huh?\d%K%P
\dYeah, everything's pretty organized, so.\d%K%P
Only because Kaede had made her clean up before\nthe move.%K%P
And even then, it still wasn't that organized.%K%P
The two of us walked back in the moonlight.%K%P
The night wind was a bit chilly.%K%P
\dShion, you cold?\d%K%P
\dHmm?\d%K%P
She wasn't dressed too warm, but she seemed fine.%K%P
\dYeah, it is fall, huh? I guess the nights are\ngetting cold.\d%K%P
\dIf you're cold, I could warm you up, you know.\d%K%P
\dGimme a break.\d%K%P
\dNo, really. That's my duty as your mistress,\nyeah?\d%K%P
She pretended to be serious, but I didn't hear it\nthat way.%K%P
She often got like this.%K%P
\dThat reminds me... Say Shion, how do you feel\nabout all this anyway?\d%K%P
\dYou mean, about our little competition?\d%K%P
\dNo, about the whole 'mistress' thing.\d%K%P
Yukari claiming to be my wife had sparked it all.%K%P
Kaede had responded by pushing back, but Shion\nhadn't really seemed forced into it or anything.%K%P
\dThat wasn't a joke. I really do want to be your\nmistress.\d%K%P
\dWait, really?\d%K%P
\dH-Hey, don't go making such a serious face now.\d%K%P
She looked away, trying to avoid my gaze.%K%P
\dYou don't seem serious about it to me.\d%K%P
She was never really one for relationships.%K%P
I couldn't even imagine her as a mistress.%K%P
\dGuess you see right through me, huh...\d%K%P
\dYeah, I guess I don't really care that much.\d%K%P
\dI mean, I really like you a lot. But that's about\nas far as it goes, I think.\d%K%P
She burst into a sarcastic sort of laugh.%K%P
\dThe other two might be serious, but I guess I was\njust kind of playing along.\d%K%P
\dI thought things would be more interesting that\nway.\d%K%P
\dPlus, I mean, if I hadn't said anything, well...\d%K%P
\dI probably woulda just been left on the\nwayside...\d%K%P
As a Goddess of Misfortune countless people had\navoided her.%K%P
She had a place here now, but even other\nGoddesses used to steer clear of her.%K%P
\dWe would never...\d%K%P
\dI thought you'd say that.\d%K%P
\dBut if I hadn't played along, I'd still have\nfallen behind.\d%K%P
\dI guess it's kinda rude, huh. Saying I only wanted\nto be your mistress 'cuz I felt lonely.\d%K%P
It certainly wasn't love.%K%P
But I understood where she was coming from, so\nmuch it hurt.%K%P
\dI'm actually glad Yukari showed up here.\d%K%P
\dShe's what finally kicked Kaede into gear.\d%K%P
\dThings are more fun now that we're all together.\d%K%P
\dSo I'm gonna keep playing my part here.\d%K%P
\dTo make sure things stay this way.\d%K%P
She was determined in her own sort of way.%K%P
This was her true motivation, something she\ncouldn't tell Kaede or Yukari.%K%P
\dYou know Shion, you're pretty cool.\d%K%P
\dHuh? Wh-What's that supposed to mean?\d%K%P
\dI mean cute or something sure, but come on, cool?\d%K%P
\dFine, cute then.\d%K%P
\dThat's better!\d%K%P
The tension in the air started to fade and things\nfelt normal again.%K%P
But we had taken a big step that we couldn't take\nback.%K%P
\dYou've got one thing wrong though, Aki.\d%K%P
\dI've said so before and I'll say it again. I want\nyou.\d%K%P
\dSo I'm not going to go back on the whole mistress\nthing now.\d%K%P
\dRemember that, okay?\d%K%P
This time I wasn't going to laugh it away if she\ntried to pass it off as a joke.%K%P
I was going to take her word earnestly.%K%P
\dWell then, my cute mistress, what shall we do?\d%K%P
\dHmm, yeah...\d%K%P
\dI want to do something...mistress-like...\d%K%P
She spoke so softly the wind almost stole her words\naway.%K%P
\dOkay, come here.\d%K%P
\d'Kay.\d%K%P
\dMmm...\d%K%P
She stood up on her toes and I bent down to bring\nus closer together.%K%P
Once we were close enough I planted my lips on\nhers.%K%P
\dMmm...\d%K%P
It was like a seal to a promise, the lightest of\nkisses.%K%P
It felt like Shion grew even smaller as it\nhappened.%K%P
Her size became all the more apparent as I held her\nup.%K%P
She may have been a Goddess, but she was a girl,\ntoo.%K%P
\dNmm... Aki... You kissed me...\d%K%P
\dWell, so I did.\d%K%P
It didn't leave my heart racing, but instead left\nme feeling warm and comfortable.%K%P
\dSo that's what kissing is like...\d%K%P
I remember her saying she'd never been kissed.%K%P
I guess I was her first.%K%P
\dWell? How was that for mistress-like?\d%K%P
\dHmm...\d%K%P
\dI feel like a real mistress would have gotten a\nmore intense kiss, but I think that was plenty\nenough for me.\d%K%P
\dThanks, Aki.\d%K%P
\dI feel like I've finally caught up to those two,\nnow.\d%K%P
\dSo, let's keep this going, yeah?\d%K%P
\d...My lover-boy!\d%K%P
